mapper.select: SELECT TPR.PRO_REQUEST_ID , TPR.PRO_REQUEST_DATE , TC.CATEGORY_NAME , TS.SERVICE_NAME , TL.REGION , TL.CITY , TPR.PRO_REQUEST_CONTENT , TP.PRO_STAR_RATE , TPR.PRO_REQUEST_PROGRESS , TBL_USER_UPLOAD.USER_UPLOAD_TITLE , tp.PRO_NAME , tp.EMP_CNT , tp.PRO_ID , TPR.PRO_REQUEST_PAY FROM TBL_PRO_REQUEST TPR INNER JOIN TBL_USER_UPLOAD ON TPR.USER_UPLOAD_ID = TBL_USER_UPLOAD.USER_UPLOAD_ID INNER JOIN TBL_SERVICE ts ON TBL_USER_UPLOAD.SERVICE_ID = TS.SERVICE_ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY tc ON TS.CATEGORY_ID = TC.CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN TBL_PRO tp ON TP.PRO_ID = TPR.PRO_ID INNER JOIN TBL_LOCATION tl ON TP.LOCATION_ID = TL.LOCATION_ID WHERE TPR.PRO_REQUEST_ID = #{proRequestId}
select tpc.PRO_ID, tpc.AWARD, tpc.CAREERINFO_ID from TBL_PRO_CAREERINFO TPC inner join TBL_PRO_REQUEST TPR on tpr.PRO_ID = TPC.PRO_ID where tpr.PRO_REQUEST_ID = #{proRequestId}

SELECT tpr.PRO_ID, tpr.USER_ID, tu.USER_NAME, tpr.PRO_REVIEW_TITLE, tpr.PRO_REVIEW_CONTENT, tpr.PRO_REVIEW_RATE, tpr.PRO_REVIEW_DATE FROM TBL_PRO_REVIEW tpr INNER JOIN TBL_USER tu ON TPR.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID WHERE TPR.PRO_ID = #{proId} ORDER BY tpr.PRO_REVIEW_DATE DESC
